title: Trump Visits Police, Military Patrolling DC
description: "Balance of Power: Late Edition" focuses on the intersection of politics and global business. On today's show, Former Vice President Mike Pence shares his thoughts on President Trump calling for Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook to resign hoping these allegations are not part of a pressure campaign. Don Vultaggio, AriZona Beverage Company Co-Founder & Chairman, discusses how. President Trump's tariffs are threatening to increase the price tag of the company's iced teas. Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee discusses the "mixed messages" being sent by recent US economic data. (Source: Bloomberg)

argos_summary: The Bloomberg program "Balance of Power" covered a range of political and economic issues, including a DOJ pressure campaign to investigate Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook over alleged mortgage fraud and the White House’s push for her resignation. Trump announced the deployment of the National Guard to Washington, D.C. to address crime, while former Vice President Mike Pence expressed support for the move and highlighted concerns about the Fed’s independence. The discussion also touched on tariff policy, AI and electric‑grid investments, and the broader impact of trade measures on inflation and the economy. Pence and other guests emphasized the need for a balanced approach to tariffs and the importance of maintaining the Federal Reserve’s political neutrality as the market anticipates the upcoming Fed policy meeting at Jackson Hole.
